00005	#exec OBJ LOAD FILE=XIIIMeshArmes.utx PACKAGE=XIIIMeshArmes
00006	
00007	class fpsmicro extends XIIIArmes;
00008	
00009	#EXEC MESH  MODELIMPORT MESH=fpsmicroM MODELFILE=models\fpsmicro.PSK LODSTYLE=10
00010	#EXEC MESH  ORIGIN MESH=fpsmicroM X=0 Y=0 Z=0 YAW=192 PITCH=0 ROLL=0
00011	
00012	#EXEC ANIM  IMPORT ANIM=fpsmicroA ANIMFILE=models\fpsmicro.PSA COMPRESS=1 MAXKEYS=999999 IMPORTSEQS=1
00013	
00014	#EXEC MESHMAP SCALE MESHMAP=fpsmicroM X=1.00 Y=1.00 Z=1.00
00015	#EXEC MESH    DEFAULTANIM MESH=fpsmicroM ANIM=fpsmicroA
00016	
00017	#EXEC ANIM DIGEST  ANIM=fpsmicroA USERAWINFO VERBOSE
00018	
00019	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsmicroM NUM=0 TEXTURE=FPS
00020	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsmicroM NUM=1 TEXTURE=micro
00021	#EXEC MESHMAP SETTEXTURE MESHMAP=fpsmicroM NUM=2 TEXTURE=micro01
